title: Me depressed?: don't make me laugh
creator_credit: Monkey See Productions, Nick Torrens and Christine Mason
brief_description: Beneath Spike Milligan’s comedic career lay a severe and debilitating depression, and he is the perfect candidate to present this helpful video on depression and ways of treating it. He speaks with sufferers as well as experts, providing a useful tool for sufferers, family and friends, and health professionals. Included on this tape are; types of depression, the importance of daily activity, charting the rise and fall of moods, controlling negative thoughts, the role of medication, the role of family and friends, suicide, and where to go for help.
